trans-unit.source: How to Check Job Progress using REST API
trans-unit.target: How to Check Job Progress using REST API

trans-unit.source: Learn how to track job progress.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to track job progress.

trans-unit.source: When you run jobs, you often require a way to track job progress.
trans-unit.target: When you run jobs, you often require a way to track job progress.

trans-unit.source: You can find out the Job status by using the Job's State property.
trans-unit.target: You can find out the Job status by using the Job's State property.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the State property, see [Job Entity Properties](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/5100ddd7-92ff-4c37-84d2-4f84fee250a7#jobentityproperties).
trans-unit.target: For more information on the State property, see [Job Entity Properties](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/5100ddd7-92ff-4c37-84d2-4f84fee250a7#jobentityproperties).
